system.requirements:
Ork Kommando Alternate Advance, 500xp
Concealment +10, Silent Move +10
system.effect: During any turn the Ork Character remains unseen by their enemies, they can choose to reveal themselves and attack. During which, they have Fear(+1) Trait.

description.value: During any turn the Ork Character remains unseen by their enemies, they can choose to reveal themselves and attack. During which, they have Fear(+1) Trait.
